name: Psurlon Ringer
languages: Deep Speech plus the languages of the Humanoid it is imitating

traits.name: Aberrant Mind
entries: Magic can't read the psurlon's thoughts or put the psurlon to sleep.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 2 (1d4 damage) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8 damage) psychic damage.

actions.name: Psychic Crush
entries: The psurlon targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw, taking 12 (3d8 + 3 damage) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The psurlon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):
